Package cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility

Class Timer

java.lang.Object
cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.Timer
public class Timer extends Object
Simple timer class suitable for this project. Modified for this project.
Author:
tedigc

  • Constructor Details

    • Timer

      public Timer(int delay, boolean running, boolean looping)
      Create a timer.
      Parameters:
      delay - delay in milliseconds.
      running - whether the timer is running when it's created
      looping - does the timer restart itself after elapsing.

      public Timer()

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public boolean tick(float delta)
      Progress the timer
      Parameters:
      delta - time since last frame.
      Returns:
      Whether the timer is finished.

      Starts the timer

      Stops the timer

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the timer. This does not stop it, for that use GdxTimer.stop()
